After a startup time of around two weeks, OCV sharply
colony was starting to thrive.Our reactors produced power
for about three weeks after the initial OCV spike.During this
added whenever OCV started decreasing;after about two days,
OCVwas recovered.It could be because wet soils favor ionic
movement and thusreduce the cell’'sinternal resistance.At the
end of the three weeks, OCV dropped and stopped recovering
afterwatering.We noticed the weakened mint plants had died,
eventuallyleading to bacteria starvation.This confirmed the
importance of selecting a plant that thrives in marshy soil for
